title: Creativesugar Lady Elegant Pointed Toe Satin Dress Flats Shoes with Pearl and Crystals

Elegant crystal Clover brooch with flexiable dangle pearl make them elegant and lovely

Satin material is smooth and noble for a lot of dress , Navy blue color for a lot of occasion
Perfect for wedding , party , prom, home stay , Halloween days, Christmas Days, Dating, Evening dress , or for mother and grandma
description: 1. Satin material for your dress 2. Heel height is 1.8cm about 5/8 inches 3. Pointed toe with a flexiable pearl and crystal as decoration 4. Rubber sole for skid resistance 5. Size 6 to size 10 6. Colors : White, Ivory, Hotpink, Navy blue, Yellow, Purple, Royal blue, Red
